PresentationTable.name: Base Facts
PresentationTable.Description: This folder contains metrics like Revenue, Billed Qty, with different types of aggregation.

PresentationColumn.name: Revenue
PresentationColumn.Description: Returns the Revenue from the Revenue Facts table with a Sum aggregation

PresentationColumn.name: Billed Quantity
PresentationColumn.Description: Returns the Billed Quantity from the Revenue Facts table with a Sum aggregation

PresentationColumn.name: Discount Amount
PresentationColumn.Description: Returns the Discount Amount from the Revenue Facts table with a Sum aggregation

PresentationColumn.name: Target Revenue
PresentationColumn.Description: Returns the Target Revenue from the Target Facts table, with a Sum aggregation

PresentationColumn.name: Target Quantity
PresentationColumn.Description: Returns the Target Quantity from the Target Facts table with a Sum aggregation
